articles.author: Nick Matoney
articles.title: Meteor spotted in the sky over parts of Pittsburgh area - WTAE Pittsburgh
articles.description: The American Meteor Society reported sightings from Virginia to Canada.
articles.content:
NEW BRIGHTON, Pa. —A meteor was spotted in the sky over parts of the Pittsburgh area on Wednesday evening.
Local meteor sightings: See the video above
The meteor was reported around 6:50 p.m.
